评论概述: Amazon essentials: fits true to measurements and sizing chart
评论详情: While these pants do fit very well, these aren't for me. I prefer a more looser fit but usually straight-leg pants are too baggy on me; I have a more skinnier build and these athletic-cut pants are too way baggy in the leg for me. Which is unfortunate, as they fit perfectly, are super soft and comfortable. So keep that in mind, as they truly are accurately measured and pay attention to the sizing chart. I'll keep these for working outdoors around the house, but will be ordering the skinny fit version of these pants instead.

评论概述: Try it on before you rip the tag off
评论详情: 6ft 190lbs athletic-ish build.  2nd of 3rd pair arrived. (black, navy, brown) two things are iffy.  this arrived with no tags, making me think i was sent a returned item. ordered 34x32 pants. This fits more 35" than a 34"  black (same size) fits snug, almost dont need a belt. this one is loose, and definitely needs a belt.  going to wait for Navy to arrive before i decide which sizing is wrong.  chino is soft. flexes well. button thread is iffy, i'll probably have to reattach it sooner than later. seam stitching looks acceptable for sub $30 pants.

评论概述: Who knew Amazon pants were any good?
评论详情: I just shed a few pounds and all my "khakis" don't fit.  I don't know if this weight loss is permanent becuase I love food and beer, so I bought a pair of these just to get me through.  Well, I'm normally a Name brand slut, but these are really god damned good.  They're super soft, they wash well, I do have to iron them to wear to work, but you can't even get a pair of pants altered for this much.  They have nice stretch, they don't pill and I even like the fit.  They're like disposable, high enough quality pants. I say worth a few bucks.

评论概述: Great Fit, Great Value—Perfect Everyday Chinos!
评论详情: I bought the Amazon Essentials Men's Athletic-Fit Casual Stretch Chino Pants for $23.90 on Amazon, and I’m genuinely impressed. These pants hit the sweet spot between comfort, style, and affordability.  What I Love:  Accurate Sizing: The size was spot-on, which isn’t always a given with online shopping. They fit perfectly—no weird bunching or overly tight areas. Stretch for Comfort: The slight stretch in the fabric is a game-changer. It gives just enough flexibility for daily wear or light activity without feeling baggy or loose. Versatile Style: These pants are a great balance of casual and polished. I can easily dress them up with a button-down for meetings or keep it casual with a T-shirt for weekends. Durability: After several wears and washes, they’ve held up well. No fading or shrinking so far, which is a huge plus at this price point. What Could Be Better:  Honestly? Nothing major. If I had to nitpick, I’d love a few more color options in the athletic fit. Final Thoughts: At $23.90, these chinos are a steal. They’re comfortable, stylish, and durable—everything you’d want in an everyday pair of pants. I’ll definitely be grabbing a couple more in different colors!

I bought my first pair a while back, maybe like a year ago. They are BY FAR my favorite pants for work. So I figured I'd order some more. I ordered a pair in khaki in the exact same size (38x29).... when they arrived I tried them on and it was like I put on 46x34s... they were HUGE... I checked the packaging and tags, everything said 38x29. So I returned them and just left it alone. Came back to give them another shot, so I bought 2 pairs to see if they'd be consistent... both pairs are labeled as ordered but completely different sizes. They're not nearly as big as the pants I was sent last time so I'm holding onto them but the inconsistency in 4 pants that are all the same size is just wild to me.

评论概述: Great pants for the money, beware color discrepancies
评论详情: I really like these pants for the cost. They are probably 80% quality of a retail J Crew (not JCF) pant at much much lower price.  The biggest complaint is that the colors you get are nowhere near the images on Amazon.com. I attached a picture of my pants and a screenshot of what I ordered. Not even close! I'll wear them anyway, but be careful. I own two other colors of these pants and they are a little off. But these were WAY off.  5 stars with a big caveat about the bad web photos.
